Class KLVObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • tv.amwa.maj.io.mxf.KLVObject

  • public class KLVObject
extends Object

    Implementation of a KLV triple value.

      • KLVObject

        public KLVObject()

      • KLVObject

        public KLVObject(UL theUL)

        Construct a KLV object with the given key.

    • Method Detail

      • setSource

        public void setSource(MXFFileImpl file,
                      @Int64
                      long location)
               throws NullPointerException

        Set the source details when an object has been read from a file, with the option to provide a byte offset.

        Parameters:
        file - The source file of this KLV object.
        location - The byte offset of the start of the key of the KLV from the start of the file, or current position if -1.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Cannot set the source of this KLV object to be a null value.

      • setSource

        public void setSource(MXFFileImpl file)
               throws NullPointerException

        Set the source details when an object has been read from a file using the current position.

        Parameters:
        file - The source file of this KLV object.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Cannot set the source of this KLV object to be a null value.

      • setDestination

        public void setDestination(MXFFileImpl file,
                           @Int64
                           long location)
                    throws NullPointerException

        Set the destination details for this object when written to a file, with the option to provide the file location.

        Parameters:
        file - The destination file for the KLV object.
        location - The byte offset of the start of the key of the KLV from the start of the file, or if -1 then the current position in that file will be used.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Cannot set the destination for this KLV object to be a null value.

      • setDestination

        public void setDestination(MXFFileImpl file)
                    throws NullPointerException

        Set the destination details for this object when written to a file, using the current file location.

        Parameters:
        file - The destination file for the KLV object.
        location - The byte offset of the start of the key of the KLV from the start of the file, or if -1 then the current position in that file will be used.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Cannot set the destination for this KLV object to be a null value.

      • getUL

        public UL getUL()

        Get this KLV objects universal label or key. Note that this could be null if not yet set.

        Returns:
        The KLV object's universal label.

      • setUL

        public void setUL(UL newUL)

        Set this KLV objects universal label or key.

        Parameters:
        newUL - New universal label for this KLV object, which can be null.

      • getLocation

        @Int64
public long getLocation()

        Get the location of this KLV object within its ultimate parent.

        Returns:
        Location of this KLV object as an offset into the source file.

      • describeSource

        public String describeSource()

        Get a textual description of where this KLV object came from.

        Returns:
        Description of where this KLV object came from.

      • describeSourceLocation

        public String describeSourceLocation()

        Get a textual description of exactly where this item came from, including its location.

        Returns:
        Textual description of exactly where this KLV object came from.

      • getKLSize

        @Int32
public int getKLSize()

        Get the size of the key and length of this KLV object. This does not include the size of the value.

        Returns:
        Size of the key and length of this KLV object.

      • setKLSize

        public void setKLSize(@Int32
                      int klSize)

        Set the size of the key and length of this KLV object. This does not include the size of the value. Note that you cannot change the source size.

        Parameters:
        klSize - Size to set for the key and length.
